summary: This code generates an XML sitemap file in the specified format for SEO purposes, using data from a "datalist" variable.

details.comment: This code generates an XML sitemap file in the specified format for SEO purposes, using data from a "datalist" variable.
details.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset
      xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9"
      xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
      xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9
            http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9/sitemap.xsd">
<!-- created with Free Online Sitemap Generator www.xml-sitemaps.com -->
{% for url_loc, lastmod, priority in datalist %}
<url>
  <loc>{{url_loc}}</loc>
  <lastmod>{{lastmod}}</lastmod>
  <priority>{{priority}}</priority>
</url>
{% endfor %}
</urlset>
